lead_paragraph: Mr. Christie continues to pursue his long-shot campaign for the White House, he has nearly vanished from the State Capitol and has scaled back his legislative goals.

headline.print_headline: A New Jersey Vanishing Act: The Governor and His Ambitions
headline.main: Chris Christie and His Ambitions: A New Jersey Vanishing Act

snippet: Mr. Christie continues to pursue his long-shot campaign for the White House, he has nearly vanished from the State Capitol and has scaled back his legislative goals.
abstract: New Jersey Gov Chris Christie is spending less time in home state as he campaigns for president, prompting criticism from Democrats and Republicans alike that he has abandoned his gubernatorial post; Christie rejects criticism of his absences, but review of his activities confirms he has scaled back his agenda and duties, and is more sparing when using his executive powers.
